DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_VISITAS_MENSAIS_FILIAL_VICE_PRESIDENTE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) MEDIAVISMENSAL
FROM K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO A
INNER JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON A.PESSOA = B.HANDLE
WHERE MONTH(A.DATACONCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND B.FASE NOT IN (1,6)
AND A.RESPOSTA NOT IN (75)
AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="MEDIAVISMENSAL" From="A" Path="MEDIAVISMENSAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
